Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Buffalo hepcidin (Cys-rich; UCSS1a; natural AMPs; ruminant, mammals; animals; 4S=S)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (81.48%) tohuman LEAP-1G=T: 12%. Mol. Wt:   2759.412; GRAVY: 0.48; Mol Formula: C110H176N34O31S9; mol ex coeff: 500.Activity: The peptide is active against S. aureus but not E. coli.SAR: The N-terminal five residues appeared to be unimportant for activity (Chanu KV et al., 2011 Biochim Biophys Acta 48:325-30). Updated 12/2011, seq 2/2023.
Literature Information.Author: Khangembam VC, Kumar A.2011
Literature Information.Title: Buffalo hepcidin: characterization of cDNA and study of antimicrobial property
